Ok, since nobody has their entry ready for the 1st monthly scenario 
contest ready, I'm going to extend the deadline by at least a week.  I 
know for myself that I have my map designed, but I just need to place 
all the characters.  Is 1 week extra week going to be long enough?

I'm also going to extend the deadline by one week for submitting 
themes for the 2nd monthly scenario contest since I offered the only 
suggestion.

*Side issue*
ignore the rest of the message if not programmer











I was side tracked trying to write a a VB program that just runs the 
"smoothe" program.  I have about 50% of the last function left to 
translate from C to VB.  A couple of statements like these have left 
me wondering:

if (around == (TO_DOWN | TO_RIGHT | TO_UP)

if (around == (TO_RIGHT | TO_UP))

The obvious translation doesn't seem quite right since neither 
TO_DOWN, TO_RIGHT, NOR TO_UP are boolean operators.  Other than that, 
I just got to weed through the nested if-then statements and 
select-case statements.
